entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
